firstCard.title: Networking feature
firstCard.description: The networking feature allows you to connect with other professionals or organizations and categorize your contacts into lists.

secondCard.title: Matching feature
secondCard.description: An algorithm suggests suitable projects, organizations, and professionals for you..

thirdCard.title: Create your own events
thirdCard.description: As a STEM actor, you can create your own events and manage the participants.

fourthCard.title: Add yourself to organizations
fourthCard.description: You can add yourself to an organization and no longer have to have a team member add you.

fifthCard.title: Interaction
fifthCard.description: You can react to existing content such as projects or posts via interactions (such as liking or commenting).

sixthCard.title: MINT-Campus connection
sixthCard.description: See who is creating courses, which courses are being taken by others and show which courses you have completed.

seventhCard.title: STEM sharepic and image database
seventhCard.description: The Sharepic Generator helps you quickly and easily create graphics for e.g. your social media posts. You can find STEM images in the image database.

firstCard.title: Dashboard
firstCard.description: The dashboard provides an overview of all platform functions at a glance and keeps you informed about the latest news after logging in.

secondCard.title: Funding tool
secondCard.description: A web crawler gathers STEM funding opportunities and presents them to you on the platform.

thirdCard.title: FAQ
thirdCard.description: In this FAQ list, we collect frequently asked questions and answers about the community platform which provide you with further information about using the platform.

firstCard.title: Filter function
firstCard.description: With the filter, you can search profiles, organizations, events, or projects based on specific criteria.

secondCard.title: Projects
secondCard.description: All community members can share their experiences from insightful and successful projects, providing valuable information for learning and inspiration. This includes downloadable materials, details on project setups, and funding information.

thirdCard.title: Language setting: English
thirdCard.description: With the extended language setting, we enable a broader group of professionals to effectively use the community platform.

fourthCard.title: Eventmanagement
fourthCard.description: Browse for suitable MINTvernetzt events, register and see who has also registered for the event.

fifthCard.title: Profile & organization profile
fifthCard.description: You introduce yourself to the STEM community using your profile and by creating your organization with its team members.

sixthCard.title: Search
sixthCard.description: You can use the search function to search for profiles, organizations, events, projects and keywords.

seventhCard.title: MINT-ID
seventhCard.description: In order to be able to easily switch between the two offers MINTvernetzt and MINT-Campus, there is the MINT-ID, with which you can use both platforms (single sign-in).

eighthCard.title: Landing page
eighthCard.description: The landing page informs new members about the content and usage figures of the community platform.
